game_description: HUGE LIBRARY WITH BRAND NEW VR CONTENT Experience the impact of a holographic presenter; Go to the 360 Degree Bubble to visit places you’ve never been before; View and interact with objects in 3D; Explore images and videos from different views; Host a Q&A, and so much more! LET’S GET STARTED! Learn more on our website: www.Fectar.com
Languages: English, English (Australia), English (UK), English (US), English (Canada), English (South Africa), Arabic, Chinese (China), Dutch, Dutch (Belgium), French (Belgium), French (Canada), French (France), Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)
review_1: Kinda like sketchfab or what have you, but also features some interactive scenes.
review_2: Tried it, loved it! And created my own VR experience (I am not a developer).
review_3: So much content, and you can create your own as well!!
